getBackIntoAccountWithEmail: Enter your email, and we will send you a link to get back into your account.
getFromFavoriteVendors: Get food, packages, and other goods from your favorite vendors.

helpTextTaxIdentificationNumber: Employer Identification Number (EIN) if you're operating as a corporation or partnership. You can locate your EIN on your confirmation letter from the IRS. You can also call the IRS to find your federal Tax ID number.
noWebsiteEnterSocialMedia: If you donâ€™t have a website, enter a social media page, LinkedIn, or other relevant link.
helpTextIndustries: By clearly industrializing business types - whether it's food, groceries, alcohol, or other goods - adhering to local laws and state regulations is not just a legal necessity but also a cornerstone of our operational integrity. For instance, delivering alcohol or pharmaceuticals requires stringent age verification, whereas restaurant food delivery demands speed and temperature control.
helpTextStorePhoneNumber: The phone number will be publicly displayed.
helpTextStoreEmail: The email will be publicly displayed.

order.vendorAutoConfirm: New orders will automatically be confirmed. The customer receives immediate acknowledgment that their order is being processed and a driver will be assigned immediately.
order.driverAutoConfirm: New orders will automatically be confirmed. The customer and vendor receives immediate acknowledgment that their order will be delivered by you.
order.noDriverFound: No nearby driver found. Plase try again later.
order.selfCancelled: There was an error processing your order. Please try again later.
order.placed: Waiting for confirmation from the vendor.
order.vendorReadyforPickup: Customer was informed the order is ready for pickup.
order.customerDriverPending: Order was assigned to a staff driver. Waiting for the driver to confirm it.
order.driverPending: The order was assigned to a driver. Waiting for the driver to confirm it.
order.driverPendingOwnStaff: The order was assigned to a driver. Waiting for confirmation from the driver.
order.lookingForDriver: Looking for a near by driver...
order.driverRejected: Looking for another near by driver...
order.arrived: Arrived to the drop off location.
order.customerArrived: Arrived to the drop off location. Meet me outside.
order.vendorOwnStaffDeliveryContact: Delivery by a vendor own staff. Contact the vendor for delivery status.
order.headingToDropOff: Heading to the drop off location.

order.vendorInTransit: In transit to the drop off location.
order.vendorDriverRejected: Re-assigning delivery to another available staff driver.
order.verdorStaffDriverRejected: Looking for the another staff driver...

editFormInstructions: If you need to to edit this form, please make the changes as needed. It usually takes less than a day for us to complete the process.
processCompletionTime: It usally take less than a week to complete this process. For Status updates, log in to Checkr, our background check provider.
requiredContactInfo: You will be asked for the email address and phone number associated with your
goOnlineToStartDeliveryRequests: Go online to start getting delivery requests from nearby vendors.
stayNearbyForOrderNotifications: Stay nearby associated vendors. We will notify you when a new order is ready for delivery.

grantingNewDriverAccess: Before granting new drivers to access the platform,
checkrBackgroundChecks: uses Checkr as its third-party provider to run secure background checks to ensure safety and security of all members of its platform.
vehicleRequirementsNewer: you need a vehicle that is 1990 or newer, and not salvaged.
requestReviewMessage: We're reviewing your request. It usually takes less than a day for us to complete the process.
applicationReviewWillConctact: We are reviewing your application. We will contact you shortly if we need any further information.
logInOrderDeliciousFood: Log in and order delicious food from vendors around you
hungryOrderFood: Hungry? Order food in just a few clicks and we'll take care of you
manageBankAccountsAndPayouts: Manage bank accounts and set up payout schedule to receive funds automaticaly.

confirmAction: Are you sure you want to

userDataRetrievalIssue: There was an issue retrieving user data.
accountRetrievalError: There was an error retrieving your account.
quantityExceedsStock: Quantity exceeds stock on hand. Only
itemOutOfStock: This item is out of stock
allowAccessToPhotos: Please allow access to your photos
enableCameraPermission: To have access to the camera you must enable the camera permission in your application settings
enablePhotosPermission: To have access to the photos you must enable the photos permission in your application settings
differentFulfillmentMethod: You cart contains items with a different fulfillment method. Adding this item for
emptyAndCreateOrder: will empty the cart and create a new order.
resetPasswordEmail: Kindly check your email and follow the link to reset your password
imageQualityRequirements: For optimal quality, we recommend holding your phone in a landscape orientation to capture all 4 corners of the document in your photo. Please ensure the information is sharp, clear, and fully visible for the highest quality image.
categoriesHelpText: Organize items into categories to find them more easily, to make navigation intuitive, and to group items with similar features.
menusHelpText: Menus are the storefrontâ€™s digital listing of food and beverage items available for sales at specified times of the day and days of the week organized by categories.
menuCategoryHelpText: Split menus into categories to organize items, to enhance menu navigation, and management.
menuSchedulleAvailabilityHelpText: Menu hours are regular store hours that apply to a specific menu. For example, from 7am to 11am, you may have a breakfast menu and from 11am to 4pm you may have a lunch menu.
parentCategoryHelpText: Assign a parent category to create a hierarchy. The term Clothing, for example, would be the parent of T-Shirt, Pants and Dresses.
modifierGroupsHelpText: Offer customizable options according to customer preferences. For example, a modifier group for a burger could include options like Cheese Type, Cooking Preference, Add-ons, etc.
title: Title
enablePriceRulesHelpText: Offer different prices for delivery and pickup order types.
taxRateHelpText: The system will automatically apply the local sales tax rate based on current regulations. This ensures your calculations remain compliant with standard tax requirements. You can always update this setting if your applicable tax rate changes.
helpTextInventoryInReview: Our support team will assist in creating your inventory. Before your store goes live, you will have the opportunity to review and make any necessary edits to the menus.
checkoutTermAndCondition: In the event that you are unavailable at the time of delivery, the delivery individual will leave your order at your doorstep. By finalizing your order, you acknowledge and accept complete responsibility for the order post-delivery. Please note, orders that include alcohol or certain restricted items might not qualify for doorstep delivery and will be taken back to the store if you are not present to receive them.
itemPhotoRequirements: File requirement JPG, PNG up to 10MB. Mininum pixels require 320 for width and height.
photoGalleryRearrange: To rearrange your photo ordering, simply press and hold down on the desired photo until it becomes movable. Then, while maintaining the hold, smoothly drag the photo to the new desired position.
inventoryDefinition: Inventory is a group of menus that are made of food and beverage items available for sales at specified times of the day and days of the week.
menuManagementFeature: Manage menus, drag and drop to sort, edit items.
individualProducts: Individual Products such as Caesar salad, Pizza, or Condiments
splitMenusIntoCategories: Split menus into categories to organize items.
categoryOrganizingDetails: Categories are the primary way to organize menus and to group items with similar features. A category must have at least one item attached to be visible on the storefront's menu. You can also add subcategories if desired.
fileRequirements: File requirements: JPG, PNG formats accepted, up to 10MB in size. Minimum pixel dimensions of 320 for both width and height.
productCategoryVisibility: Every product must be assigned to at least one category to be visible in the storefront's menu.

snackbar.submissionStatus: Request received. We are reviewing your submission.

industry.descriptionDominicanBodega: Caribbean ingredients such as plantains, yuca, rice and beans, dairy products, meats and seafood.
industry.descriptionCoffeShop: Hot chocolate, smoothies, cold beverages like iced coffee and iced tea
industry.descriptionStreetFoodCart: Variety of quick eats like fried plantains, taco, kipes, chimi, pica pollo (fried chicken), and yaroa.
industry.descriptionGroceryAndGourmet: Fresh produce, dairy products, meats, canned goods, bakery items.
industry.descriptionConvinience: Snacks, beverages, tobacco products, lottery tickets, over-the-counter medications, toiletries, and fresh or packaged ready-to-eat foods.
industry.descriptionPetSupplie: Pet food, treats, toys, bedding, cages, aquariums, leashes, collars, and grooming tools
industry.descriptionLiquor: Sell alcohol while maintaining compliance with stringent age verification, local alcohol delivery laws & regulations. Alcohol delivery is subject to the specific rules and guidelines established by local state and provincial authorities.
